root.name: Totem Runner
root.description: OverviewTotem Runner is an action runner game developed by Yagoda Production and published by Chillingo for the iPhone and iPad platforms.GameplayIn Totem Runner the player is constantly moving to the right. In order to avoid obstacles and enemies the player can switch between a human and various animals on the fly. Scores are based on your ability to collect gems, safely traverse terrain, and grow flowers in your wake.FormsHuman: Only form that allows you to grow flowers.Eagle: Allows you to clear large gaps. Tilting the device allows you to travel vertically across the screen in order to collect gems.Rhino: Allows you to travel through obstacles such as vines, rocks, and enemies. Also provides invulnerability to enemies weapons.
